description: Updates the properties of an AppImageConfig.

parameters.name: AppImageConfigName
parameters.description: The name of the AppImageConfig to update.

parameters.name: KernelGatewayImageConfig
parameters.description: The new KernelGateway app to run on the image. The specification of the Jupyter kernels in the image. (dict) --- The specification of a Jupyter kernel. The name of the Jupyter kernel in the image. This value is case sensitive. DisplayName (string) --- The display name of the kernel. FileSystemConfig (dict) --- The Amazon Elastic File System storage configuration for a SageMaker AI image. MountPath (string) --- The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user. DefaultUid (integer) --- The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000. DefaultGid (integer) --- The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

nested_params.name: KernelSpecs
nested_params.description: The specification of the Jupyter kernels in the image.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the Jupyter kernel in the image. This value is case sensitive.

nested_params.name: DisplayName
nested_params.description: The display name of the kernel.

nested_params.description: The Amazon Elastic File System storage configuration for a SageMaker AI image.

nested_params.name: MountPath
nested_params.description: The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user.

nested_params.name: DefaultUid
nested_params.description: The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000.

nested_params.name: DefaultGid
nested_params.description: The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

parameters.name: JupyterLabAppImageConfig
parameters.description: The JupyterLab app running on the image. FileSystemConfig (dict) --- The Amazon Elastic File System storage configuration for a SageMaker AI image. MountPath (string) --- The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user. DefaultUid (integer) --- The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000. DefaultGid (integer) --- The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100. ContainerConfig (dict) --- The configuration used to run the application image container. ContainerArguments (list) --- The arguments for the container when you're running the application. (string) --- ContainerEntrypoint (list) --- The entrypoint used to run the application in the container. (string) --- ContainerEnvironmentVariables (dict) --- The environment variables to set in the container (string) --- (string) ---
